title.en: A Synopsis of Guru Padmasambhava’s Life

text.en: With neither cause nor condition you were magically born
text.en-trans: gyukyen mi nga oma chen gyi tso

text.en: From a lotus flower on the Milky Lake in the South, Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: pedong lé trung dzükyé pema jung

text.en: I supplicate you! Pray remove my obstacles;
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tsé di barché sol
tu ru ka yi dé nam dul du lok

text.en: And grant all favorable conditions for the comfort of beings and the teaching of Buddha.
text.en-trans: ten dang dro la dekyi denpar dzö

text.en: In the future may we all awaken as a single gathering
In the Palace of the Glorious Copper-Coloured Mountain,
text.en-trans: orgyen pejung nyi dang yermé du

text.en: Indivisible from you, the master of Uḍḍiyāna!
text.en-trans: tsombu chik tu ngönpar sangye shok
